text:
Robert George Dylan Willis (born Robert George Willis; 30 May 1949 – 4 December 2019) was an English cricketer. He played for Surrey, Warwickshire, Northern Transvaal and England. He was a "Wisden" Cricketer of the Year for 1978. He was born in Sunderland, Tyne and Wear, England.
Willis died on 4 December 2019 at the age of 70.
